title: Poppy W and snowballs in ARAM
body:
Poppy's W should either stop the dash (from snowball) or the wording in the snowball/dash description should be changed.

Steadfast Presence: 
ACTIVE: Poppy gains bonus movement speed for 2.5 seconds and generates a barrier around her for the duration, **causing all enemies who dash within to be knocked down** and dealt magic damage.

Mark (spell) **Snowball**
ACTIVE: Throws a snowball a long distance, dealing 15 - 100 (based on level) true damage to the first enemy unit hit. If Mark hits an enemy, **you gain the ability to cast Dash for the next 3 seconds**.

Poppy's W does not block Malphites "Unstoppable Force" which clearly defines the ability as a dash BUT with the addition of immune to crowd control in the description.

This seems like an over sight and should be reworded.

Tom

replies.body:
Riot has made the Mark/Dash's immunity reasonably clear visually. It literally makes you a snowball and your health bar and name become transparent.

http://imgur.com/NksrS6F

Regardless it's probably a good idea to get some more clarity in. I wouldn't be surprised if a full ability description rework was being planned for the future.
Your character becomes invulnerable when in snowball form. She can't just stop something that's not really there at the time.
It doesn't say it's a dash, it's just called Dash, though that is misleading.
I agree, People forget how important wording actually is.
